column5: MLCO Deutsche Banks analyst Karen Tang must be talking with MLCO execs this week as yesterday she raised her PT another 4 to 28 she raised from 21 to 24 last month calling MLCO the best idea in the group and reaffirming her BUY rating Special note was that VIP is ramping up well at CODreams now that the top floor salons are operating at the new Morpheus This VIP play news bodes well for WYNN if one is paying attentionGroup poised to run from here as the GGR comps for Macau overall are significantly easier from now through May 2020 LVS MGM
